channel.title: Allow people only from client?
channel.description:
Ive tried the tutorial and it didnt work, even tried messing with the code for 7 hours with no luck.
Im on Ddsspeced v2 client & source.
Anyone help?

item.title: Allow people only from client?
item.dc:creator: @Thrasher_Alpha Thrasher Alpha
item.description:
@Thrasher_Alpha wrote:

lesterknome:

It should work if you did it correctly, try making your client send a packet, like 16293, and unless your server receives that packet; it disconnects the player.

The server already had it implemented for some reason, and I tried to enable it to use my signlink UID, but nothing worked. Try it for yourself.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 04, 2009, 06:12:20 pm[/size][hr]When I make the UID on the server to allow >= 1, it lets people on for some reason, even though in signlink.java (yes i did compile), it sais its an 8 digit number.

Read full topic

item.title: Allow people only from client?
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

It should work if you did it correctly, try making your client send a packet, like 16293, and unless your server receives that packet; it disconnects the player.
